name: The Ultimate Heist
description: Ever wanted to go on an adventure where you get to infiltrate some of the most High Security Vaults across the world? We have you covered, use the gadgets at your disposal to neutralize your foes!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 550 MB available space
